meanings.definition: Relating to or consisting of a codicil.
meanings.sent1: The lawyer reviewed the codicillary document to ensure it followed the main will.
meanings.sent2: She added a codicillary clause to the contract to clarify the terms.
meanings.sent3: The codicillary note was like a small update to the original message.
meanings.sent4: His codicillary changes to the recipe made it even more delicious.
meanings.sent5: The codicillary details in the painting brought out its true beauty.
